title: Headpiece, 1870s
medium:
Medium: beads, fur, leather, brass
Technique: strung beads, stitched to fur
description: Rows of beads in red, green, white and black are attached to teh top and bottom borders of a shaped band of fur. Three small brass knobs at the center top. Leather thongs attached at edges, for tying on to head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Headpiece, 1870s.Medium: beads, fur, leather, brass
Technique: strung beads, stitched to fur. 1969-98-11.
